name: Cyclonic pendant
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
The pendant spins cyclonic vacuums that disrupt enemy spellcasting.
